body_html:
FYI: I started on this branch if someone's curious.

Carsten's list:

  • Indentation rules: 2 whitespaces, no extra indentation for private methods
  • New hash syntax ({ foo: :bar } instead of { :foo => :bar })
  • Aligning case and when on the same level
  • Lines not longer than ~100 characters
  • No trailing whitespace
  • First-level describe should be RSpec.describe
  • No parentheses for method definitions without args, mandatory parentheses for method definitions with args
  • Omit parenthesis on method calls without arguments
  • Omit FactoryGirl and just use create :foo
  • No explicit self
  • No explicit return at the end of a method

body:
FYI: I started on [this branch](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/tree/feature/845-discussion-static-code-analysis-via-rubocop-codeclimate) if someone's curious.

_Carsten's list:_

- [x] Indentation rules: 2 whitespaces, no extra indentation for private methods
- [x] New hash syntax (`{ foo: :bar }` instead of `{ :foo => :bar }`)
- [x] Aligning `case` and `when` on the same level
- [ ] Lines not longer than ~100 characters
- [x] No trailing whitespace
- [ ] First-level `describe` should be `RSpec.describe`
- [x] No parentheses for method definitions _without_ args, mandatory parentheses for method definitions _with_ args
- [x] Omit parenthesis on method calls without arguments
- [ ] Omit `FactoryGirl` and just use `create :foo`
- [x] No explicit `self`
- [x] No explicit `return` at the end of a method
